alert.note: Alert for Adams; Jackson; Juneau; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:34AM CST until March 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: .OVERVIEW...Periodic freezing rain will continue through this morning. Ice will accrue on untreated surfaces, making travel hazardous to dangerous... potentially impossible in some areas. Travel is highly discouraged along and north of I-94 this morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected with ice accumulations from a trace to up to 1/10". * WHERE...Juneau, Adams, Trempealeau and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
